Summary Heading: Short Walk To the Beach - Clean
Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Corona del Mar, thanks in large part to having a great condo. We were only a few short blocks to the best beach we visited in the Newport Beach area. And the price was affordable, too.  Doug was very friendly and helpful with everything that we needed. The condo was clean and well stocked with pots, pans, dishes, etc., which was helpful the night we picked up some fresh fish to cook for ourselves.
Room tip: Don't rent a car bigger than medium-sized; it won't fit in your half of the garage....
